summary:
I am a regular player of Skyrim, and to my knowledge there are no Dragon Boats available, so I have designed my own in keeping with the game. This Dragon Boat home can be found under the Blue Palace, near the Solitude Docks.

This new shape of player home comes with everything you may need for your adventures around the world of Skyrim, complete
descriptionHtml:
This Dragon Boat home can be found under the Blue Palace, near the Solitude Docks.

Update

New lighting, the boat is a bit darker now and has a better feel to it
Alchemy table in the lab has been fixed 
Navmesh has been double checked
The main door has been fixed so you don\'t see the wall behind it 

This new shape of player home comes with everything you may need for your adventures around the world of Skyrim, complete with 9 new characters (NPC).


Shop Keepers

* Gayle - Food Vendor
* Meg - Dress Vendor
* Nicole - Potions Vendor
* Riley - Blacksmith
* Irving - Purveyor of Whatever you Need (on or off the black market!!!)

New followers

* Dexter - Wizard
* MagicFingers - The thief with the fastest fingers!
* Brutus - A fine brave Warrior
* Scales - An Assassin with a reputation for being unseen

This home has all mannequins, weapon racks, weapon plaques, & working areas you will need, including a self contained Smithy & fully stocked Laboratory.

Bugs / Glitches

If you have any issues with this mod, please contact me as soon as you can. I have only found one glitch so far, when loading this home for the first time,
author: Me
